thread.title: Read The Federal Appeals Court’s Ruling On Donald Trump’s Travel Ban
thread.title_full: Read The Federal Appeals Court’s Ruling On Donald Trump’s Travel Ban

author: Paige Lavender
title: Read The Federal Appeals Court’s Ruling On Donald Trump’s Travel Ban
text:
Read The Federal Appeals Court’s Ruling On Donald Trump’s Travel Ban It's a major blow to the Trump administration. 02/09/2017 07:00 pm ET Paige Lavender Senior Politics Editor, The Huffington Post 
A federal appeals court declined President Donald Trump’s administration’s request to restore the executive order that suspended refugee resettlement and barred immigrants and travelers from several Muslim-majority countries from entering the U.S. 
The Thursday ruling was unanimous. 
Read more here , and see the court’s ruling below: Do you have information you want to share with the Huffington Post? Here’s how. More:
